Four stasis pods dropped down to earth, when they landed, one of them
scann=
ed a Triceratops, and another scanned a T-Rex. They landed with 2
in close =
proximity and 1 a little farther away and one in the distance. 
   One of t=
he two close together was shot open, and Big Convoy
emerged, noticing the o=
ther pod, Big Convoy decided he'd better open
it before any predacons did, =
even though whoever was in the the pod
would most likely get in his way sho=
uld they run into any...(OOC: If
you watched BW neo you would know this is =
due to his "one man army"
attitude), so he opened it, and to his surprise, =
Lio Convoy was in there, 
    "Lio Convoy! What a surprise!" Big convoy sai=
d, "Hmm so that makes
two leader-types to crash today" A voice said, emergi=
ng from a bush,
it was Chomp, the Triceratops transformer, in his robot mod=
e... "Who
you callin' leader type kid?" Big convoy said arguing his role as=
 a
Convoy... then Lio Convoy said, "Heh, some things never change... by
the=
 way, who are you?" "Beast mode!" Chomp said transforming, "You can
call me=
 Chomp..." The two convoys stared at each other as if Chomp had
said someth=
ing weird... "What? it's a nice name, it fits me, as seeing
as how I like f=
ood and enegeron alot..." He said as he started to eat
the bush he emerged =
from... the two convoys just laughed... 
   Meanwhile a good distance away =
but not too far away to spy on them,
Terry was spying on them, waiting for =
the right moment "Laugh while
you can fools! Terry, terrorize! Hmm that has=
